short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change the font of Youtube Caption to Chollima-Che

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Change the font of Youtube Caption to Chollima-Che.

YoutubeCaption천리마체 changes the font of Youtube Caption to the DPRK font Chollima.

If you don't like the southern style font, you may want to include this extension.

As an added bonus, this would change the name of the leader to bold.


The font is from Red Star OS.
